anya-e1211n:16_0: Bho buddhā tumhepi kho maṃ pāletha.
anya-e1211n:27_0: Buddhassa bhagavato iddhi kiṃ na kare
anya-e1211n:75_0: Bho guṇavaṃ purisa tvampi dānaṃ dehi
anya-e1211n:76_0: Bho guṇavanto purisā tumhe dānaṃ detha
anya-e1211n:95_0: Bho gacchaṃ yaññadatta tvaṃ maṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n:197_0: Jantumpetaṃ kaṭaṃ kāremi teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:198_0: Jantupete kaṭaṃ kārema teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:201_0: Jantunā riyena yo koci sukhaṃ pāpuṇati
anya-e1211n:202_0: Jantūhi ariyehi ye keci sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:215_0: Bho satthā tvaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n:229_0: Satthari dhammarāje ko bhattiṃ na ghaṭīyati
anya-e1211n:414_0: Bho yāgu tvaṃ pana khudaṃ bhana
anya-e1211n:434_0: Bho mātā tvaṃ pana ciraṃ jīva
anya-e1211n:460_0: Jambuyā kho pana yo koci jīvati
anya-e1211n:461_0: Jambūhi kho pana ye keci jīvanti
anya-e1211n:526_0: Guṇavatā kulamhā na apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:527_0: Guṇavantehi kulehi na apenti ye keci
anya-e1211n:536_0: Bho gacchaṃ guṇavaṃ tvaṃ pana sugatiṃ gacchāhi
anya-e1211n:556_0: Bho aṭṭhi saṅkhalikaṃ tvaṃ aniccato passa
anya-e1211n:560_0: Aṭṭhinā kāyena yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n:561_0: Aṭṭhīhi kāyehi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n:576_0: Bho daṇḍī tvaṃ pana kammaṃ karohi
anya-e1211n:590_0: Daṇḍini pana me mano na ramati
anya-e1211n:591_0: Daṇḍīsu kho pana me manā na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:596_0: Bho āyu tvaṃ pana jīvitaṃ pālehi
anya-e1211n:610_0: Āyūmhi kho pana manaṃ patiṭhitaṃ sabbadā
anya-e1211n:611_0: Āyūsu kho pana manaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:617_0: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e1211n:622_0: Kānici pana saheva etesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ idaṃ.
anya-e1211n:628_0: Bho sabbā bhuta kalyāṇaṃ karohi kusalā sadā;
anya-e1211n:629_0: Bho sabbe purisā bhaddaṃ karotha kusalaṃ sadā.
anya-e1211n:631_0: Sabbe bhojāpayī te tu sā nakhīyittha bhojanaṃ.
anya-e1211n:642_0: Sabbasmiṃ buddhadhamme ca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:643_0: Sabbesu ca vihāresu thūpe kāresi khattiyoti.
anya-e1211n:646_0: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṅkā therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e1211n:647_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṃ khitaṃ.
anya-e1211n:648_0: Bho sabbe ca paje tvampi dānaṃ dadāhi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:649_0: Bho sabbāyo pajā tumhe sīlaṃ rakkhatha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:651_0: Sabbāyo diṭṭhiyo hantvā khemaṃ gacchanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1211n:652_0: Sabbassā assu kaññāya niccaṃ kammaṃ karīyyate;
anya-e1211n:655_0: Sabbāhi ca nadīheva khettaṃ vapati kassako.
anya-e1211n:656_0: Sabbassā assu kaññāya cittaṃ nadeti paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:658_0: Sabbassā pana taṇhāya vimuttassa natthi bhayaṃ;
anya-e1211n:661_0: Sabbāsaṃ pana gaṅgānaṃ mahogho hoti sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:662_0: Sabbassā neva kaññāya cittaṃ ramati paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:663_0: Sabbāsu ceva gaṅgāsu macchā caranti sabbadāti.
anya-e1211n:668_0: Bho sabbā bhūta kalyāṇaṃ puññaṃ karohi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:669_0: Bho sabbānica bhūtāni puññaṃ karotha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:670_0: Sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ samādāya pāraṃ tiṇṇosi brāhmaṇo;
anya-e1211n:671_0: Sabbāni assu puññāni katvāna tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e1211n:682_0: Sabbasmiṃ puññakammeca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:706_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññā bahuṃ puññaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n:707_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n:708_0: Bho pubbe kaññe bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n:709_0: Bho pubbā kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n:710_0: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci kaññaṃ puññaṃ kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:711_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo puññe kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:712_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya puññaṃ kataṃ
anya-e1211n:713_0: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi puññāni katāni
anya-e1211n:714_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci anucarī
anya-e1211n:715_0: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi keci anucariṃsu
anya-e1211n:716_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya ābharaṇaṃ adadī
anya-e1211n:718_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci puriso apeto.
anya-e1211n:719_0: Pubbāhi yāya kāhici kaññāhi keci purisā apetā
anya-e1211n:720_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya mātāpitaro ahesuṃ
anya-e1211n:722_0: Pubbāyaṃ yāya kāyaci kaññāyaṃ cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n:723_0: Pubbāsu yāsu kāsuci kaññāsu cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e1211n:726_0: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci pana bahuṃ puccaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n:727_0: Pubbāni yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n:728_0: Bho pubba bhūta tvaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n:729_0: Bho pubbāni bhūtāni bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n:730_0: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci puññaṃ kārāpayī ekacco
anya-e1211n:731_0: Pubbāni yāni kānici puññe kārāpayiṃsu ekacce
anya-e1211n:758_0: Ekassa garuno kho pana parikkhāro hoti
anya-e1211n:759_0: Ekesaṃ garūnaṃ kho pana guṇaghoso hoti
anya-e1211n:764_0: Ekā kaññā pana devadattaṃ kambalaṃ yācate
anya-e1211n:782_0: Ekaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:800_0: Yo koci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti
anya-e1211n:801_0: Ye keci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpenti
anya-e1211n:802_0: Yaṃ kiṃci dāsaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:803_0: Ye keci dāse gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:808_0: Yassa kassaci dānaṃ deti saddho sappuriso
anya-e1211n:818_0: Yā kāci vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:819_0: Yā kāci vanitāyo dāsī kamme kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:820_0: Yaṃ kiṃci vanitaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti puriso
anya-e1211n:821_0: Yā kāci vanitāyo puññaṃ kārenti purisā
anya-e1211n:822_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpīyate
anya-e1211n:823_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpito
anya-e1211n:824_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:825_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti sāmikā
anya-e1211n:826_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:827_0: Yāsaṃ kāsaṃci vanitānaṃ ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:828_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:829_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:832_0: Yāyaṃ kāyaṃci vanitāyaṃ me cittaṃ na ramati
anya-e1211n:833_0: Yāsu kāsuci vanitāsu me cittāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:836_0: Yaṃ kiṃci kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:837_0: Yāni kānici kulāni bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:838_0: Yaṃ kiṃci bahuṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti koci
anya-e1211n:839_0: Yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ kārenti keci
anya-e1211n:869_0: Tesu bhikkhūsu pana me mano ramati.
anya-e1211n:872_0: Sā khattiyakaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:886_0: Tāyaṃ khattiya kaññāyaṃ pasīdati yo koci
anya-e1211n:890_0: Taṃ kulaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:891_0: Tāni kulāni pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:892_0: Taṃ kulaṃ uddissa puññaṃ karoti koci
anya-e1211n:893_0: Tāni kulāni uddissa puññāni karonti keci
anya-e1211n:908_0: Eso sisso ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchati
anya-e1211n:909_0: Ete sissā ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchanti
anya-e1211n:926_0: Esā vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e1211n:936_0: Etāya vanitāya pana yo koci apeti
anya-e1211n:937_0: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
anya-e1211n:944_0: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:946_0: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana passati yo koci
anya-e1211n:947_0: Etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci
anya-e1211n:950_0: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti
anya-e1211n:951_0: Etehi kulehi pana janā sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:952_0: Etassa kulassa kho pana dhanaṃ dadāti dhanavā
anya-e1211n:953_0: Etesaṃ kulānaṃ pana dhanaṃ dadanti dhanavantā
anya-e1211n:954_0: Etasmā kulamhā kho pana ekacco na apeti
anya-e1211n:955_0: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
anya-e1211n:958_0: Etasmiṃ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
anya-e1211n:959_0: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:962_0: Ayaṃ jano pana taṃ purisaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:963_0: Ime janā te purise puññaṃ kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:980_0: Ayaṃ kaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:990_0: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:991_0: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:998_0: Imaṃ cittaṃ pana attano santānaṃ vijānāti
anya-e1211n:1006_0: Imassa cittassa ovādaṃ deti yo koci
anya-e1211n:1007_0: Imesaṃ cittānaṃ ovādaṃ denti ye keci
anya-e1211n:1016_0: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ toseti
anya-e1211n:1022_0: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1023_0: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1030_0: Amusmiṃ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati
anya-e1211n:1031_0: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1034_0: Asu upāsikā pana sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti
anya-e1211n:1040_0: Amuyā upāsikāya yo koci pana sucarati
anya-e1211n:1041_0: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana sucaranti
anya-e1211n:1045_0: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana apenti
anya-e1211n:1049_0: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1052_0: Aduṃ dhanavaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:1070_0: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṃ kodhassa gacchati;
anya-e1211n:1071_0: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
anya-e1211n:1072_0: Kaṃsi tvaṃ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
anya-e1211n:1073_0: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1074_0: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto kuvaṃ sattassa kārako;
anya-e1211n:1075_0: Kehidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
anya-e1211n:1076_0: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
anya-e1211n:1077_0: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṃ rakkhanti devatā.
anya-e1211n:1079_0: Kesaṃ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
anya-e1211n:1081_0: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1082_0: Kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāya vācaṃ bhasayi īdisaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1084_0: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
anya-e1211n:1088_0: Kā ca suphassayaṃ dānaṃ mañcapīṭhādikaṃ adā;
anya-e1211n:1089_0: Kāyo nānāvidhaṃ puññaṃ katvāna tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1090_0: Kaṃ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṃ sīlaṃ paripālayī;
anya-e1211n:1091_0: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
anya-e1211n:1092_0: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
anya-e1211n:1093_0: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
anya-e1211n:1094_0: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṃ sukhaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1095_0: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1099_0: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
anya-e1211n:1100_0: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:1101_0: Kāsaṃ kho pana kaññānaṃ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
anya-e1211n:1102_0: Kassaṃ nadiṃ pana macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā;
anya-e1211n:1103_0: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā.
anya-e1211n:1106_0: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
anya-e1211n:1107_0: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṃ jānema taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1108_0: Kiṃ tvaṃ attavasaṃ disvā mama dajjāsimaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1109_0: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1112_0: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṃ kannu yocasi;
anya-e1211n:1113_0: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṃ saddho yajati gotamaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1114_0: Kassa so kayirā mettiṃ tamāhu cariyaṃ budhā;
anya-e1211n:1116_0: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ iti rājā apucchitaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1117_0: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.
anya-e1211n:1120_0: Kasmiṃ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1121_0: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṃ so sakhāhitoti.
anya-e1211n:1170_0: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṃ uppajjati
anya-e1211n:1174_0: Tayi citte kho pana kusalacittaṃ patiṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n:1244_0: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;
anya-e1211n:1245_0: Tato nāmikapantīsu natū vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e1211n:1247_0: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.
anya-e1211n:1248_0: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e1211n:1249_0: Te me saddoti viññeyyo viññunā nayadassināti.
anya-e1211n:1612_0: Dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā sataṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1615_0: Taṃ lakkhanti vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā dasasatasahassaṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1629_0: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṃ rathā
anya-e1211n:1630_0: Rathe rathe sataṃ assā asse asse sataṃ narā
anya-e1211n:1631_0: Nare nare sataṃ kaññā eke kissaṃ satitthiyo
anya-e1211n:1637_0: Kamo kaccāyane eso pāliyā so virujjhati
